statements.text: Video learning courses are a good learning format.
Video learning courses aren't a good learning format.
Video learning courses make it difficult for students to receive proper guidance from their instructors.
Video learning courses don't make it difficult for students to receive proper guidance from their instructors.
This motion never suggested that videos would be the only learning format available. Teachers can still pick up where the videos left off and elaborate when necessary.
This motion never didn't suggest that videos would be the only learning format available. Teachers can still pick up where the videos left off and elaborate when necessary.
Video learning courses do not give constructive feedback necessary for students to properly understand their progression in the course.
Video learning courses give constructive feedback necessary for students to properly understand their progression in the course.
The platform Accelerate [1] has 4 question "quizzes" that disallow the user to make a mistake.
The platform Accelerate [1] doesn't have 4 question "quizzes" that disallow the user to make a mistake.
Accelerate also does not provide many recent external sources for users to research, leading to many falling behind
Accelerate also provides many recent external sources for users to research, leading to many falling behind
The user can be of blame for this, as they should be able to find their own source
The user can't be of blame for this, as they should be able to find their own source
Sometimes there are only unreliable sources a user can learn from, such as many sites paying to be on the 1st page and be non-credible
Sometimes there aren't only unreliable sources a user can learn from, such as many sites paying to be on the 1st page and be non-credible
The sources that are provided tend to also be taken down, especially with flash-based simulations.
The sources that are provided tend to also be not taken down, especially with flash-based simulations.
An issue with one specific platform does not discredit the various video learning course platforms available.
An issue with one specific platform discredits the various video learning course platforms available.
If a student gets stuck while watching a prerecorded video, they can ask a question via a chat function or emailing the instructor.
If a student doesn't get stuck while watching a prerecorded video, they can ask a question via a chat function or emailing the instructor.
Many students in the UK have had little contact with their teachers [2] even though learning was expected to take place remotely after the outbreak of COVID-19.
Many students in the UK haven't had little contact with their teachers [2] even though learning was expected to take place remotely after the outbreak of COVID-19.
In a live classroom, teachers are able to rephrase and give examples that may better explain a problem. This is beneficial for the student.
In a live classroom, teachers aren't able to rephrase and give examples that may better explain a problem. This is beneficial for the student.
Thanks to zoom.us [3] teachers can have live classrooms online.
Thanks to zoom.us [3] teachers can't have live classrooms online.
Numerous student users do not prefer to use Zoom [4].
Numerous student users prefer to use Zoom [4].
The application' video meeting system happens to be so laggy, that it often cuts out audio for multiple moments at a time [5].
The application' video meeting system doesn't happen to be so laggy, that it often cuts out audio for multiple moments at a time [5].
The lag from Zoom can end up kicking users from important meetings for latency.
The lag from Zoom can't end up kicking users from important meetings for latency.
During live streams, students may be more hesitant to ask their teachers to go over things they do not understand more than once, when compared to a more familiar classroom environment
During live streams, students may be more hesitant to ask their teachers to go over things they do understand more than once, when compared to a more familiar classroom environment
Zoom does provide a feature for users to record their meeting.
Zoom doesn't provide a feature for users to record their meeting.
This feature is included in a premium program that costs too much to pay for just that feature.
This feature isn't included in a premium program that costs too much to pay for just that feature.
People can use free recording programs such as OBS (Open Broadcasting System) [6] to record the meeting.
People can't use free recording programs such as OBS (Open Broadcasting System) [6] to record the meeting.
A lot of users reported that Zoom eats up their ram [7], which can be harmful to students that may have older computers. [1] [8]
A lot of users didn't report that Zoom eats up their ram [7], which can be harmful to students that may have older computers. [1] [8]
Not all students have access to the necessary bandwidth required to access a livestream, this is especially bad for students living in rural areas.
Not all students have access to the necessary bandwidth required to access a livestream, this isn't especially bad for students living in rural areas.

Venezuela has the absolute worst internet connections on Earth [9], so much so that even downloading the average video would take ~17.9 minutes, thus making it not viable for any video learning course.
Venezuela hases the absolute worst internet connections on Earth [9], so much so that even downloading the average video would take ~17.9 minutes, thus making it viable for any video learning course.
Video learning lacks a degee of interaction which obstructs learning efficiency.
Video learning doesn't lack a degee of interaction which obstructs learning efficiency.

Fields like physical science require physical interaction with an environment. If a student living in an urban environment had an assignment that required them to go to a natural environment to gather samples, this assignment may keep them behind.

Fields like physical science don't require physical interaction with an environment. If a student living in an urban environment had an assignment that required them to go to a natural environment to gather samples, this assignment may keep them behind.

There can be conventional lessons where remaining questions and difficulties are resolved (hybrid learning [10]). Moreover, these issues can be utilized as data to improve the information attached to videos (e.g. searchable FAQs) or the videos (e.g. making them clearer).

There can't be conventional lessons where remaining questions and difficulties are resolved (hybrid learning [10]). Moreover, these issues can be utilized as data to improve the information attached to videos (e.g. searchable FAQs) or the videos (e.g. making them clearer).
Video learning courses may not be as good in helping students understand solutions to exercises if such are included in these.
Video learning courses may be as good in helping students understand solutions to exercises if such are included in these.
They are less dynamic where teachers can adapt to what solutions students came up with and also answer their questions, or adjust their solution explanations, and so on.
They aren't less dynamic where teachers can adapt to what solutions students came up with and also answer their questions, or adjust their solution explanations, and so on.

In cases of homework and learning before exams there are similar problems. Attached solutions are often not elaborate and not well-explained. Digitization would improve such issues, not make them worse.
In cases of homework and learning before exams there are similar problems. Attached solutions are often elaborate and not well-explained. Digitization would improve such issues, not make them worse.
Video learning courses are a form of passive learning that don't encourage critical thinking.
Video learning courses are a form of passive learning that do encourage critical thinking.
The extent of passive learning in videos depends on the content of the video and not the video itself.
The extent of passive learning in videos dependses on the content of the video and the video itself.
Some videos may have interactive content, such as small exercises.
Some videos may not have interactive content, such as small exercises.
Videos made to teach young children may encourage them to count, spell, or sing along with what they see.
Videos didn't make to teach young children may encourage them to count, spell, or sing along with what they see.
This is not commonly the case, in notable courses (World History, Art History, etc.) established for Edgenuity, exercises are not provided.
This is commonly the case, in notable courses (World History, Art History, etc.) established for Edgenuity, exercises are not provided.
More information may be retained [11] while reading since it is an active learning process. Video watching is a passive learning process.
More information may not be retained [11] while reading since it is an active learning process. Video watching is a passive learning process.
Watching to one talk about Language Arts is not as informative as reading.
Watching to one talk about Language Arts is as informative as reading.
Videos show actionable steps in detail, unlike manuals, making them easier to follow and repeat.
Videos don't show actionable steps in detail, unlike manuals, making them easier to follow and repeat.
The Ikea manuals are too complicated for somebody to put together, namely the shelves. Videos will be more helpful.
The Ikea manuals aren't too complicated for somebody to put together, namely the shelves. Videos will be more helpful.
Ikea manuals [12] are notorious for being void of text, leaving many to struggle with putting the most simple-looking pieces together.
Ikea manuals [12] aren't notorious for being void of text, leaving many to struggle with putting the most simple-looking pieces together.
Some Arduino block kits [13] are very plain in detail.
Some Arduino block kits [13] aren't very plain in detail.
Depending on the topic, passive learning can be a good thing.
Depending on the topic, passive learning can't be a good thing.
Passively listening to foreign languages [14] can help the brain understand them better over time.
Passively not listening to foreign languages [14] can help the brain understand them better over time.
Active recall tends to be a more successful learning style [15] than passive learning methods.
Active recall doesn't tend to be a more successful learning style [15] than passive learning methods.
Active recall can be implemented with watching videos. After watching a video, an individual can try and answer a number of questions on the video.
Active recall can't be implemented with watching videos. After watching a video, an individual can try and answer a number of questions on the video.
Though sites do it often, the info is not fully retained by the user for long enough.
Though sites do it often, the info is fully retained by the user for long enough.
Those similar sites provide a tab where the user can take notes of the video.
Those similar sites don't provide a tab where the user can take notes of the video.
The user could just not be paying attention.
The user could just be paying attention.
Passive learning does not encourage critical thinking, which many students need to use during this era.
Passive learning does encourage critical thinking, which many students need to use during this era.
When watching videos, many people merely pay attention to the visuals rather than focusing on the learning content.
When watching videos, many people merely don't pay attention to the visuals rather than focusing on the learning content.
Critical thinking isn't necessary for all subjects.
Critical thinking is necessary for all subjects.
A video may simply convey information without the need for problem-solving.
A video may not simply convey information without the need for problem-solving.
One needs to critically think when it comes to the more important subjects such as math, science, and language arts while other subjects are less demanding.
One doesn't need to critically think when it comes to the more important subjects such as math, science, and language arts while other subjects are less demanding.
A lot of meeting software like Zoom Or Adobe connects have chat rooms so the teacher can ask questions to students
A lot of meeting software like Zoom Or Adobe connects haven't chat rooms so the teacher can ask questions to students

If they are a good learning format does not imply that they would be a good exclusive learning format or that it would be good to largely learn through lecture videos. They can only be a relatively small but important component of learning or at least not the only type of learning.

If they are a good learning format does imply that they would be a good exclusive learning format or that it would be good to largely learn through lecture videos. They can only be a relatively small but important component of learning or at least not the only type of learning.
Watching videos may allow a person to replicate what they see, but not troubleshoot any problems that arise.
Watching videos may allow a person to replicate what they see, but troubleshoot any problems that arise.
Video learning courses require self-discipline, which many students struggle with (pg 20 [16]).
Video learning courses don't require self-discipline, which many students struggle with (pg 20 [16]).
Students with ADHD struggle [17] with remote learning courses, which typically includes video content.
Students with ADHD struggle [17] with remote learning courses, which typically doesn't include video content.

These courses are usually partaken of in an environment in which the user feels most comfortable; therefore, the amount of distractions is increased and thus the temptation is stronger, whereas physical learning environments often (purposefully) lack these distractions.

These courses aren't usually partaken of in an environment in which the user feels most comfortable; therefore, the amount of distractions is increased and thus the temptation is stronger, whereas physical learning environments often (purposefully) lack these distractions.
Video learning courses accommodate a variety of learning styles and abilities.
Video learning courses don't accommodate a variety of learning styles and abilities.
With video learning courses, the student benefits from watching lessons rather than reading them.
With video learning courses, the student doesn't benefit from watching lessons rather than reading them.
People can therefore learn from images rather than videos.
People can't therefore learn from images rather than videos.
Images are just a single frame and therefore, cannot show how to completely implement the instructions.
Images are just a single frame and therefore, canshow how to completely implement the instructions.
Visual data is substantially easier [18] for the human brain to process than text.
Visual data isn't substantially easier [18] for the human brain to process than text.
A significant [19] portion of the population are visual learners, so videos are a good format for them.
A significant [19] portion of the population aren't visual learners, so videos are a good format for them.
Videos with sound can also cater to the 30% of the population who are auditory learners [20].
Videos with sound can't also cater to the 30% of the population who are auditory learners [20].
People prefer to learn in different ways.
People don't prefer to learn in different ways.

People have different types of memory [21]. This impacts their preferred learning style. For example, some people have a hearing memory and some people remember things more visually and video brings those two together very well.

People don't have different types of memory [21]. This impacts their preferred learning style. For example, some people have a hearing memory and some people remember things more visually and video brings those two together very well.
Even if people are more suited to visual learning, they should improve those styles of learning they are less good at, in order to develop a more well rounded skillset.
Even if people aren't more suited to visual learning, they should improve those styles of learning they are less good at, in order to develop a more well rounded skillset.

"Some people have x memory" implies completely distinct modules, which is not the case. In humans the visual center is far larger than the other senses, and new neurons are primarily born in the olfactory bulb and hippocampus (important role in spatial navigation).

"Some people have x memory" implies completely distinct modules, which is the case. In humans the visual center is far larger than the other senses, and new neurons are primarily born in the olfactory bulb and hippocampus (important role in spatial navigation).
Video courses working well for more independent learners.
Video courses not working well for more independent learners.
Independent learners can be self-starters, not needing one-on-one instruction [22] in order to complete assignments. Video courses are a good learning format for these individuals.
Independent learners can be self-starters, needing one-on-one instruction [22] in order to complete assignments. Video courses are a good learning format for these individuals.
A lecture often offers the opportunity [23] for attendees to ask clarifying questions.
A lecture often doesn't offer the opportunity [23] for attendees to ask clarifying questions.
With a lecture, answers can be given in real time. The attendee doesn't have to wait to receive it.
With a lecture, answers can be given in real time. The attendee does have to wait to receive it.
Video learning are helpful for slower learners.
Video learning aren't helpful for slower learners.
Online video courses are typically self-paced, giving the learner the option of going as fast or as slow as needed.
Online video courses aren't typically self-paced, giving the learner the option of going as fast or as slow as needed.
Some video course formats make the user feel rushed if they are behind on their lessons. This is discouraging to the user.
Some video course formats don't make the user feel rushed if they are behind on their lessons. This is discouraging to the user.
Any particular course can be repeated multiple times and at the student's personal pace which is not possible in a class.
Any particular course can be repeated multiple times and at the student's personal pace which is possible in a class.
Video learning allows you to go back on something you weren’t listening to, because you weren’t focused.
Video learning allows you to go back on something you weren’t listening to, because you weren'tn’t focused.
Sites like VirtualNerd [24] provide students with the ability to go back over information if they need to.
Sites like VirtualNerd [24] don't provide students with the ability to go back over information if they need to.
Those sites may also discourage looking at the videos again.
Those sites may not also discourage looking at the videos again.
This can prove to be a negative influence on a student's record.
This can't prove to be a negative influence on a student's record.
Some people can focus and memorize better when alone and not sitting in a room full of people or having to listen to a physical person talking instead of to a controllable video.
Some people can focus and memorize better when alone and sitting in a room full of people or having to listen to a physical person talking instead of to a controllable video.

Many students prefer [25] to not have any audiovisual lessons (mainly referring to conventional physical-classroom ones) – when social aspects are not considered and the alternatives are well-designed – and can learn better just with e.g. texts and/or audio. Having video lessons available but not required may better be possible with video lessons.

Many students prefer [25] to have any audiovisual lessons (mainly referring to conventional physical-classroom ones) – when social aspects are not considered and the alternatives are well-designed – and can learn better just with e.g. texts and/or audio. Having video lessons available but not required may better be possible with video lessons.
This may also better enable or facilitate students to skip lessons altogether.
This may not also better enable or facilitate students to skip lessons altogether.
This problem can be mitigated in various ways such as having brief alternated multiple-choice questions after chapters that verify if the student has indeed learned the contents.
This problem can't be mitigated in various ways such as having brief alternated multiple-choice questions after chapters that verify if the student has indeed learned the contents.

In many cases, they do not know which learning styles fit them best because students in nearly all cases never get to systematically/scientifically test these to appropriately personalize their learning.
In many cases, they know which learning styles fit them best because students in nearly all cases never get to systematically/scientifically test these to appropriately personalize their learning.

Even if they know which learning styles tend to be most efficient for them, they may still need audiovisual lessons for the required level of understanding and hence excluding or skipping them may reduce the quality of their education/grades and/or increase the time required – for example because they decide in hindsight to also have the audiovisual lesson after they already learned through other/alternative means.

Even if they know which learning styles tend to be most efficient for them, they may not still need audiovisual lessons for the required level of understanding and hence excluding or skipping them may reduce the quality of their education/grades and/or increase the time required – for example because they decide in hindsight to also have the audiovisual lesson after they already learned through other/alternative means.
People could choose from which of the available learning styles or media suits them best.
People couldn't choose from which of the available learning styles or media suits them best.
Video learning courses are more convenient for students and teachers and have unique advantages.
Video learning courses aren't more convenient for students and teachers and have unique advantages.
Video learning courses are a less restrictive form of learning than some traditional methods.
Video learning courses aren't a less restrictive form of learning than some traditional methods.
Traditional learning occurs at designated hours. Learning through video can take place at any time.
Traditional learning doesn't occur at designated hours. Learning through video can take place at any time.
Lectures in universities tend to follow a timetable [26].
Lectures in universities don't tend to follow a timetable [26].
Having classes at designated hours helps students stay disciplined.
Having classes at designated hours doesn't help students stay disciplined.
Students doing online classes are often separated from other fellow students and educators, making it difficult for the teacher to know what the student may be doing at the moment.
Students not doing online classes are often separated from other fellow students and educators, making it difficult for the teacher to know what the student may be doing at the moment.
Teachers won't know what students are doing, if they are all separated, such as now.
Teachers will know what students are doing, if they are all separated, such as now.
This sometimes is not the case, sites such as Grammarly and Odysseyware have been proven to track the progress of the students and sometimes how active they are within their sites.
This sometimes is the case, sites such as Grammarly and Odysseyware have been proven to track the progress of the students and sometimes how active they are within their sites.
Not all the time can teachers take control. For example in MS Teams sometimes some people mess around, leading to teachers getting frustrated.
Not all the time can't teachers take control. For example in MS Teams sometimes some people mess around, leading to teachers getting frustrated.
With video learning courses, students can be location-independent.
With video learning courses, students can't be location-independent.
Video learning courses allow students in more isolated living situations a chance to learn.
Video learning courses don't allow students in more isolated living situations a chance to learn.
A number of video learning platforms help educate people living in impoverished and remote areas.
A number of video learning platforms don't help educate people living in impoverished and remote areas.
Impartus [27] aims to improve literacy in rural communities in Asia.
Impartus [27] doesn't aim to improve literacy in rural communities in Asia.
Online video courses [28] at Lumacha Primary School in Gansu, China help students whose families cannot afford to send them to better-equipped schools.
Online video courses [28] at Lumacha Primary School in Gansu, China help students whose families canafford to send them to better-equipped schools.
A lecture encourages intellectual discussion while a video is more likely to be watched isolated from others.
A lecture encourages intellectual discussion while a video isn't more likely to be watched isolated from others.
Students can arrange to have discussions with one another after watching videos individually.
Students can't arrange to have discussions with one another after watching videos individually.
In comparison to text, videos may help some people feel like they aren't alone.
In comparison to text, videos may help some people feel like they are alone.
A video can help the learner to feel like they are physically present at the lecture.
A video can't help the learner to feel like they are physically present at the lecture.

Sometimes those videos have limited access or can't provide a backup for those to analyze. This can be especially hard when a student has to use a live lecture and can't record the lecture to analyze multiple times.

Sometimes those videos have limited access or ca provide a backup for those to analyze. This can be especially hard when a student has to use a live lecture and can't record the lecture to analyze multiple times.
They are not similar. A video is a static, unchanging presentation of information. A lecturer can get visual or auditory feedback and change adjust their lecture on the fly.
They are similar. A video is a static, unchanging presentation of information. A lecturer can get visual or auditory feedback and change adjust their lecture on the fly.
Traditional learning methods take place in a location such as a classroom or lecture hall. In contrast, learning through video can occur in a number of locations.
Traditional learning methods don't take place in a location such as a classroom or lecture hall. In contrast, learning through video can occur in a number of locations.
During a crisis situation where the majority of schools are closed [29] (like the Covid-19 outbreak), remote video learning can help ensure that education continues.
During a crisis situation where the majority of schools are closed [29] (like the Covid-19 outbreak), remote video learning can't help ensure that education continues.
With video learning courses, students will be able to get more rest since they won't have to wake up earlier to travel to school.
With video learning courses, students will be able to get more rest since they wo have to wake up earlier to travel to school.
Video courses may still require the student to be awake and present during normal class hours.
Video courses may not still require the student to be awake and present during normal class hours.
Video learning courses are beneficial to students who are physically incapable of traveling to an in-person class.
Video learning courses aren't beneficial to students who are physically incapable of traveling to an in-person class.
Students with physical disabilities can still attend class with video courses.
Students with physical disabilities can't still attend class with video courses.
During the Covid-19 pandemic, virtual classrooms [30] allowed the school year to continue remotely around the world.
During the Covid-19 pandemic, virtual classrooms [30] didn't allow the school year to continue remotely around the world.
Teachers can turn to public information sources such as YouTube or Facebook to teach a concept.
Teachers can't turn to public information sources such as YouTube or Facebook to teach a concept.
Teachers can still use these sites in a classroom setting.
Teachers can't still use these sites in a classroom setting.
A systemic review shows that in comparison to traditional text methods, video enhances [31] student learning.
A systemic review doesn't show that in comparison to traditional text methods, video enhances [31] student learning.
Unlike for conventional lessons, one can easily pause, skip a few seconds back or rewatch.
Unlike for conventional lessons, one can't easily pause, skip a few seconds back or rewatch.

With video lessons, it is unlikely for teachers to have students copy what they write on blackboards which may usually obstruct students from paying attention and learn efficiently. Hence, video lessons are more convenient and time-saving for most students.

With video lessons, it isn't unlikely for teachers to have students copy what they write on blackboards which may usually obstruct students from paying attention and learn efficiently. Hence, video lessons are more convenient and time-saving for most students.

Additional information such as answers to questions students previously had about something said at a specific moment or in a specific chapter and so on can be attached to the video at the time-stamp. They can also be searchable.

Additional information such as answers to questions students previously hadn't about something said at a specific moment or in a specific chapter and so on can be attached to the video at the time-stamp. They can also be searchable.
With video lessons, teachers would be required to just hand students the handouts that they would have written on the blackboard or have students simply print it.
With video lessons, teachers wouldn't be required to just hand students the handouts that they would have written on the blackboard or have students simply print it.
There are other ways such could happen, such as requiring teachers to do so or to give students the option for that.
There aren't other ways such could happen, such as requiring teachers to do so or to give students the option for that.
Some students may learn better when writing everything, not just brief notes, down themselves during lessons (not just during learning in the form of cheatsheets/summaries and exercises).
Some students may learn better when writing everything, just brief notes, down themselves during lessons (not just during learning in the form of cheatsheets/summaries and exercises).
Video learning courses can be difficult to follow.
Video learning courses can't be difficult to follow.
Videos allow the viewer to make connections between ideas that otherwise may get lost in text format.
Videos don't allow the viewer to make connections between ideas that otherwise may get lost in text format.
Demonstrative lessons, such as science experiments, may work better when there is a viewable instructor guiding the student rather than text instructions.
Demonstrative lessons, such as science experiments, may not work better when there is a viewable instructor guiding the student rather than text instructions.
Those visual instructions also assist users in experiments if necessary materials are unavailable.
Those visual instructions also assist users in experiments if necessary materials aren't unavailable.
Text format is straight forward and cannot be miscommunicated by a third party, such as an instructor on a video.
Text format is straight forward and canbe miscommunicated by a third party, such as an instructor on a video.
When reading text, tone is harder to detect.
When reading text, tone isn't harder to detect.
Tone isn't necessary for learning a new skill or subject, as the content is typically informational.
Tone is necessary for learning a new skill or subject, as the content is typically informational.
There are many technical and educational challenges to video learning courses that aren't present with other learning formats.
There are many technical and educational challenges to video learning courses that arepresent with other learning formats.
The video may be low quality making it hard for the student to understand.
The video may not be low quality making it hard for the student to understand.
Videos can have technical glitches that distort the lesson, making it difficult to for students to completely comprehend.
Videos can't have technical glitches that distort the lesson, making it difficult to for students to completely comprehend.
If the video is equipped with a feature to slow down the speed or rewind, then this problem can be avoided.
If the video is equipped with a feature to slow down the speed or rewind, then this problem can't be avoided.
Some programs have this feature disabled and require that you install an extension to speed-up or slow-down the content.
Some programs don't have this feature disabled and require that you install an extension to speed-up or slow-down the content.
This is a problem with the specific program, not video format in general.
This is a problem with the specific program, video format in general.
If people feel the video is leaving them behind, then they may become frustrated and disengage from the rest of it.
If people don't feel the video is leaving them behind, then they may become frustrated and disengage from the rest of it.
Technical and educational challenges are not exclusive to video learning courses; every learning format has its obstacles.
Technical and educational challenges are exclusive to video learning courses; every learning format has its obstacles.
Video courses can advance and democratize the field of education.
Video courses can't advance and democratize the field of education.

In order to access video courses a computer and internet connection is needed. Not all students have access to this [32].
In order to access video courses a computer and internet connection is needed. all students have access to this [32].
With such distance learning [33], poorer countries can have not only high-quality teachers through online lessons but also would not need to pay for the school attendance or for traveling to school.
With such distance learning [33], poorer countries can have not only high-quality teachers through online lessons but also would need to pay for the school attendance or for traveling to school.

They may be overpaying and subject to unacceptable corporate monopoly power uses, but they still do have [37] some form of sufficient Internet access.

Meshnets [38] could enable them to access the Internet or contents from a local node without more expensive forms of infrastructure. In some developed countries like in Germany [39], Toronto [40] and Catalonia [41], there already are freely accessible networks albeit it currently (this could be changed) still needs some technical skills and security may be lower without a VPN. A router is often required. A little top-down support may be needed for expansion, saving lives during disasters [42] and educational purposes.

In some developed countries like in Germany [39], Toronto [40] and Catalonia [41], there already are freely accessible networks albeit it currently (this could be changed) still needs some technical skills and security may be lower without a VPN. Even in sub-Saharan Africa ~30% [43] have some form of Internet access. Hence people who do have access could be granted to go to somebody registered who has or similar.

Internet access isn't really needed as the videos could get distributed in the form of video files, for example from a local person who has Internet, by physically sending an USB drive/stick or otherwise. Internet access would only be needed for the most comprehensive and dynamic variants of this.
